courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced piano techniques, including arpeggios, scales, and complex pieces.

courses.title: Music Production for Beginners
courses.description: An introduction to music production, covering DAW software, mixing, and mastering basics.

courses.title: Vocal Training: Improve Your Voice
courses.description: Enhance your vocal abilities with techniques for breath control, pitch, and tone.

courses.title: Drumming for Beginners
courses.description: Start drumming with this beginner course that covers beats, rhythm, and basic drum techniques.
